title: Phylo
overlay:
The sequences

This website displays sequence data contributed to the GISAID database by contributors around the world. You can find the acknowledgements for a specific sequence by clicking on it. We gratefully acknowledge all data contributors, i.e. the Authors and their Originating laboratories responsible for obtaining the specimens, and their Submitting laboratories for generating the genetic sequence and metadata and sharing via the GISAID Initiative1 on which this research is based.

1. Elbe, S., and Buckland-Merrett, G. (2017) Data, disease and diplomacy: GISAIDâ€™s innovative contribution to global health. Global Challenges, 1:33-46. DOI: 10.1002/gch2.1018 PMCID: 31565258
